result.description:
In March 2013 I gave a presentation to my local web development group devICT over the different forms and uses of Regular Expressions. The talk was just under two hours long and was well received by the audience (approximately 25 developers). The presentation was broadcast through Google Hangouts On Air and the video is available on YouTube.

Slides and source
result.subtitle: Or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Regex
result.name: Regular Expressions 101
result.summary: A presentation I gave to devICT teaching basic and advanced features of regex.
